start_text: We need your feedback so we can further improve this course in the next semester. Thank you for your help!

choices.title: explained well
choices.off_feedback_inspiration: how can the lecturer improve his explanations?

choices.title: was clearly structured
choices.off_feedback_inspiration: how can we improve the structure of the lecture?

choices.title: contained information useful to me
choices.off_feedback_inspiration: what would have been useful for you to learn today?
choices.on_feedback_inspiration: what is the most useful thing you have learned today?

choices.title: did not contain terminology unknown to me
choices.off_feedback_inspiration: which term(s) should we explain the next time?

questions.title: next semester, the lecture should be

choices.title: were clearly formulated
choices.off_feedback_inspiration: can you tell us of a specific poorly formulated question?

choices.title: were solvable given the material from the lecture
choices.off_feedback_inspiration: how can we prepare you better for the exercises?

choices.title: helped to improve my skills
choices.on_feedback_inspiration: which question did you like best?

choices.title: were easy understandable
choices.off_feedback_inspiration: how can we improve our solutions?

questions.title: next semester, additional exercises should be
questions.value_high_text: JOIN US, we need you! At the end of the questionnaire, you can leave us your E-Mail :)

questions.title: next semester, the focus should be

choices.title: was well organized
choices.off_feedback_inspiration: how can we improve our organisation?

choices.title: fulfilled my expectations
choices.off_feedback_inspiration: what should have been included in the event which wasn't?

choices.title: will be recommended by me to others

questions.title: other courses/events I'll visit
questions.lot_selected_text: Wow, we will see us often! Why not leave us your E-Mail at the end? We'd love to get to know you!

questions.title: your email, if you want to get to know TheAlt better
